subject: Re: [junit] Junit Questions
msgSnippet: ... Look at the junit task for Ant.  Ant makes it very easy to automatically unit test your code, and can automate most other aspects of your build and
messageBody:
pamroberts_99 wrote:

> Does Junit -
> provide a place to store & rerun unit test?
> provide a way to schedule unit test suites - so that you can test a
> suite of unit test after a build?

Look at the junit task for Ant. Ant makes it very easy to automatically
unit test your code, and can automate most other aspects of your build
and deployment process as well.

--
